General.Name: Patriot Gold Corp
General.Description: Patriot Gold Corp., together with its subsidiaries, acquires, explores, and develops natural resource properties in the United States. It primarily explores for gold deposits. The company holds a 100% interest in the Vernal property that consists of various unpatented mining claims covering an area of approximately 248 acres in Nevada; and holds 100% interest in Moss Mine project located in Oatman District of Mohave County Arizona. It also holds interests in the Windy Peak property, which includes various unpatented mineral claims covering approximately 2,337 acres in southwest Nevada; and the Rainbow Mountain property that consists of various unpatented lode claims covering an area of approximately 1,620 contiguous acres in Nevada. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Reno, Nevada.
General.Address: 401 Ryland Street, Reno, NV, United States, 89502
